thread.title: Is it possible to open Doom3 alpha levels with Doom 3?

post.author: Altered Reality
post.body: As we all know, the Doom 3 alpha doesn't work with video drivers that came out after 2003. This is why I was wondering: did anyone try to open the levels of the alpha through the retail version of Doom 3 ? Do they work?

post.author: rich_is_bored
post.body:
This topic was covered less than 48 hours ago...
